Haoda Li

Computer Science and Data Science @ U of Toronto

Publications

Projects

mverse

An extension that provides user friendly abstractions and examples to multiverse for explorable multiverse analysis in R.

Single Cell Portal

Application for data processing and interactive visualization on large scale, high dimension data in single cell analysis.

Notebook

Toolkit for quickly converting Jupyter notebooks to Github Pages. Perfect for cross-platform viewing and sharing.

Cubic Stylization

Final project for CSC419 Geometry processing, a C++ libigl implementation of Cubic Stylization [Liu, Jacobson, 2019].

SPH and FLIP fluid

Final project for CSC417 Physics based Animation, a CPU implementation of SPH and FLIP method using Eigen and libigl.

Landmark Recognition

Final project for CSC420 Intro. to Image Understanding, a large-scale image classification to Google's landmark dataset using Pytorch and OpenCV.

Data Reports

The collection of all data science reports and course projects.
